txt.en: Monster Players do not utilize equipment. You can however keep and use items in your Inventory.
Items can be equipped from your backpack by right-clicking them. You can see your equipped items in the Character Journal.

You have obtained an item! Any items you obtain will be contained within your inventory. You can access your inventory via the interface at the bottom of the screen or by using the designated hotkey <rgb=#FFFF00>(defaulted to the 'I' key)</rgb>.\n\nIn your inventory, you can <rgb=#FFFF00>double-click</rgb> a piece of armour or weapon to equip it to your character. You can also open your Character panel <rgb=#FFFF00>(by pressing C)</rgb> and drag the item into the appropriate equipment slot. <rgb=#FFFF00>NOTE:</rgb> If you already have an item equipped, the new item will become equipped and the old item will return to your inventory.
